STARTER_TEMPLATE_HERO_SECONDARY_TITLE: Discover Recipes, Plan Meals, and Simplify Cooking
TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Hear from the culinary artists who love our app for creating delicious meals.
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: This app makes meal planning and prep a breeze! The recipe suggestions and step-by-step guides are so helpful.
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: As a professional chef, I'm blown away by the depth of this app. The ingredient database and technique videos are invaluable resources.
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Whether I'm cooking for my family or hosting a dinner party, this app ensures I can whip up amazing dishes every time.
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get answers to common questions about our app for making foods
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: What kind of recipes does the app offer?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our app has a vast collection of recipes ranging from quick snacks to elaborate multi-course meals. We cover all cuisines and dietary preferences.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: Absolutely! You can easily build and save your own recipes, complete with ingredients, instructions, and photos.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: Does it have shopping list functionality?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Yes, the app automatically generates shopping lists based on the recipes you plan to make. You can also add items manually.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Yes, our app allows you to scale recipes up or down to fit your desired portion sizes with a simple tap.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: Is there a meal planning feature?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Yes, you can plan out your meals for the week or month using our calendar. The app will provide grocery lists accordingly.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_CALL_TO_ACTION_SUBTITLE: Discover endless possibilities in the kitchen with our intuitive app.
LANDING_PAGE_ANNOUNCEMENT_TEXT: Introducing a delightful new way to cook!
LANDING_PAGE_HERO_TEXT: Master the Art of Home Cooking
LANDING_PAGE_SUB_HERO_TEXT: Discover delicious recipes, step-by-step guides, and cooking tips to elevate your culinary skills. Make every meal a masterpiece!
SIGN_UP_COMPONENT_ALREADY_HAVE_ACCOUNT_P: Already a master chef? Log in
STARTER_TEMPLATE_FOOTER_CONTENT: Unleash your culinary creativity with CookMate. Discover new recipes, plan meals, and elevate your cooking skills with our user-friendly app designed for food enthusiasts.
FEATURE_1_BODY: Our easy-to-use interface allows you to create new recipes with simple drag-and-drop ingredients and step-by-step instructions.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Access our comprehensive database of thousands of ingredients from around the world to inspire your culinary creations.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Automatically generate shopping lists based on your recipes, making grocery trips a breeze.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Easily find recipes that fit your dietary needs like vegan, gluten-free, keto, and more with our advanced filtering system.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Share your masterpieces with friends and family, get feedback, and discover new recipes from our vibrant community.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Follow along with video instructions from expert chefs to perfect your technique and plate like a pro.
CTA_BODY: Discover a world of delicious possibilities with our app for making all kinds of mouthwatering foods. From easy weeknight meals to gourmet feasts, we've got you covered.
CTA_SUBTITLE: Explore Recipes, Plan Meals, Shop Ingredients
HERO_SUBTITLE: Discover, create, and share delicious recipes effortlessly.
SIDEBAR_BOTTOM_SUBTEXT_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Discover delicious recipes and master new cooking skills
CONTACT_FORM_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Let us know how we can help with your culinary needs
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_1: High-quality knives for slicing, dicing and chopping
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_2: Durable pots and pans for easy cooking and cleaning
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_3: Solid wood board for safe food prep
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_4: Nesting bowls in various sizes for mixing and serving
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_5: Essential tools like spatulas, whisks and ladles
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_6: Powerful appliance for chopping, shredding and pureeing
PLACEHOLDER_FAQ_TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions About Our Cooking App
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: What kinds of recipes does this app offer?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Our app has an extensive library of recipes from around the world, covering a wide range of cuisines, dietary needs, and skill levels. Whether you're looking for classic comfort foods, healthy meal ideas, or gourmet dishes, we've got you covered.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: Can I save my favorite recipes?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: Absolutely! Our app allows you to create a personalized recipe box to save all your favorite dishes. You can also add notes and modifications to the recipes for future reference.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: How do I find recipes that fit my dietary needs?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Our recipe search and filtering options make it easy to find dishes that match your specific dietary requirements, such as vegetarian, vegan, gluten-free, or low-carb. Simply use the dietary filters to narrow down your search results.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Is there a meal planning feature?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Yes, our app includes a convenient meal planning tool that allows you to plan your meals for the week ahead. You can add recipes to your meal plan, generate shopping lists based on the ingredients needed, and even adjust serving sizes.
PAGE_DETAIL_1_VALUE: Our app simplifies the cooking process, guiding you through recipes step-by-step with clear instructions and intuitive features.
PAGE_DETAIL_2_VALUE: Explore a vast collection of recipes from around the world, catering to diverse dietary preferences and culinary styles.
PAGE_DETAIL_3_VALUE: Generate intelligent grocery lists based on your chosen recipes, ensuring you never miss an ingredient.
